title: Mega Ping spikes
body:
Ive been getting ping spikes today and 2 days ago, for no reason. This is the first time this has ever happened. I got all the way to 14k ping. No joke. 
And then suddenly yesterday, nothing. And now, today, i am in game and i am experiencing the same thing
Whats going on?

replies.body:
ok, so. more news
i testes my game today, and here are the results:

https://gyazo.com/ac1584e7e82a8a02caa09cce660a769f
https://gyazo.com/7624b821de49a9dbfe49a1353cf91edd
https://gyazo.com/e94e8859377a4d6372c17f77bec0128f
https://gyazo.com/da7a16cb22b47dc8e2f9e9a7490135bc
**NOTE THAT THESE ARE NOT REAL GAMES. tHESE GAMES ARE FROM THE PRACTICE TOOL, WHERE THERE ARENT EVEN OTHER PLAYERS WITH ME**
I also have exeperienced something really weird
When I lost connection in those games, i also lost connection to teamspeak. That means that league is crashing my whole internet connection. Why? And more important, How?
I tried various things but nothing really worked. I disabled the firewall, i tried to reset the routeru and the modem, but nothing works. DSo you have anything for me?

Eeeeee with that kind of ping spike I'm a little worried your connection might have hit some packet loss along the way to our servers. Let's check that really quick with our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take your recent games logs and pop 'em into that reader, take a screenshot using something like Imgur or Gyazo, and paste it here for us to look over with you.
